metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18184 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in QPDF before 7.0.0. There is a stack-based out-of-bounds read in the function iterate_rc4 in QPDF_encryption.cc.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18184` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf21 - 8.0.2-3~14.04.1
qpdf - 8.0.2-3~14.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> couldn't reproduce in trusty or xenial. Also code in these two releases are quite different from patch one.

criterions.comment: qpdf package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.2-3~14.04.1').
